trans-unit.source: Shutting down by using the API

seg-source.mrk: Shutting down by using the API

target.mrk: Shutting down by using the API

trans-unit.source: You can use the NetworkServerControl API to shut down the Network Server from within a Java application.

seg-source.mrk: You can use the NetworkServerControl API to shut down the Network Server from within a Java application.

target.mrk: You can use the NetworkServerControl API to shut down the Network Server from within a Java application.

trans-unit.source: The name of the method that you use to shut down the Network Server is <codeph>shutdown()</codeph>.

seg-source.mrk: The name of the method that you use to shut down the Network Server is <codeph>shutdown()</codeph>.

target.mrk: The name of the method that you use to shut down the Network Server is <codeph>shutdown()</codeph>.

trans-unit.source: For example, the following command shuts down the Network Server running on the current machine using the default port number (1527):

seg-source.mrk: For example, the following command shuts down the Network Server running on the current machine using the default port number (1527):

target.mrk: For example, the following command shuts down the Network Server running on the current machine using the default port number (1527):

trans-unit.source: To shut down a server running with user authentication, you need to use a NetworkServerControl instance created with user credentials:

seg-source.mrk: To shut down a server running with user authentication, you need to use a NetworkServerControl instance created with user credentials:

target.mrk: To shut down a server running with user authentication, you need to use a NetworkServerControl instance created with user credentials:

trans-unit.source: NetworkServerControl server = new NetworkServerControl(username, password); server.shutdown();

seg-source.mrk: NetworkServerControl server = new NetworkServerControl(username, password); server.shutdown();

target.mrk: NetworkServerControl server = new NetworkServerControl(username, password); server.shutdown();
